snippet: CBS argues that the show is a direct copy of its summer reality show "Big Brother," but after arguments on Friday a federal judge said he was not inclined to step in to prevent "Glass House" from being broadcast on Monday.
abstract: CBS argues that the show is a direct copy of its summer reality show "Big Brother," but after arguments on Friday a federal judge said he was not inclined to step in to prevent "Glass House" from being broadcast on Monday.

headline.main: Judge Seems Reluctant to Follow CBS and Block 'Glass House' on ABC
